{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = RBD52G-5HacD2HnD-TC 01.png |image1_size = 300px |caption = Wireless AC1200 Gigabit Access Point/Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac2 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD hAP |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ac 2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RBD52G-5HacD2HnD-TC |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4018; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 710 <!-- 710 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVSM <!--(W25Q128FVSIG)-->; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 64:D1:54,CC:2D:E0, |oui = 64:D1:54,CC:2D:E0,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;L4;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.8 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pad header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/15/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 69 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B079SD8NVQ |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MikroTik", "D52G-5HacD2HnD" and "hAP ac2 series" is silkscreened on the board. 27dBm power, 2.5dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas {{see also|MikroTik}}
*'''MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac 2 (RBD52G-5HacD2HnD-TC)''' (US) :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac2 '''hAP ac2'''] (tower case) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND] (2018-01-15) :5x GbE ports, PoE, USB 2.0, Wave 2 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://uloz.to/!KboRhNGccV6O/en-datasheet-hap-ac-2-tower-pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @716MHz, 16/128MB • [https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?t=129649 MT forum] {{FCC ST|07/11/2018|indexme.}}
===Amount of memory=== {{Notice |Early models (including the FCC filing) had '''256 MiB of RAM''', but newer models only ship with '''128 MiB of RAM''' (NT5CC64M16GP-DI RAM chip). This ''may'' be distinguishable with the additional '''/r2''' marking on the internal label.}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://openwrt.org/inbox/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap_ac ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''OpenWrt wiki'''] ([https://openwrt.org/_media/media/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap-ac2_back.jpg PCB image] and [https://openwrt.org/_media/media/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap-ac2_front.jpg front internal image]) *[https://habrahabr.ru/post/351044/ ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''HabraHabr'''] (RU) ([https://hsto.org/webt/m9/b0/zo/m9b0zopdplsty9l9k45ccl3tvkc.jpeg internal images]) *[https://weblance.com.ua/374-obzor-hap-ac2-rbd52g-5hacd2hnd-tc-odin-v-pole-voin-i-alternativa-hex-hap-ac.html ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''WebLance'''] (RU) ([https://weblance.com.ua/uploads/posts/2018-05/1526226406_review_mikrotik_hap_ac2_rbd52g-5hacd2hnd-tc_pic17_cpu_ipq4018.jpg PCB images])
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?t=129649 ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''MikroTik''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:65135 ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''iXBT''' forums] (RU) ([http://forum.ixbt.com/post.cgi?id=attach:14:65135:10:1.jpg internal image])
